UPCAencoder
public class UPCAencoder
extends java.lang.Object

    UPCAencoder()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String checkDigit​(java.lang.String productCode)
    This method uses the checkSum method from the PostNetEncoder class.
    java.lang.String convertProductNum​(int number, int i, int productCodeLength)
    This method uses if statements to find the correct product num to return.
    java.lang.String createBarcode​(java.lang.String productCode)
    Takes in a string of numbers and uses the convertProductNum to convert the numbers to the corresponding binary representation.
    java.lang.String productCodeToBarcode​(java.lang.String productCode)
    Given the product code this method calls the checkDigit method and then uses the number returned to call the createBarcode and returns the barcode made.

    • checkDigit

      public java.lang.String checkDigit​(java.lang.String productCode)

      This method uses if statements to find the correct product num to return.

    • createBarcode
